oc_tab.description: Adds natural nerve bar to players from Torn Stats and adds a bar to open ready OCs. Requires Torn Stats.

roster_tab.description: Adds a faction tab that shows the roster of players in your Torn Stats faction. Requires Torn Stats.

ranked_war_filter.description: Adds a window to the ranked war page that allows you to filter players. Requires Torn Stats.

territory_war_spies.description: Adds a spy column to territory wall wars for each player. Requires Torn Stats.

faction_profile_spies.description: Adds a spy column to the faction members list on the faction profile page. Requires Torn Stats.

faction_profile_filter.description: Adds a window to the faction profile page that allows you to filter faction members.

faction_name_in_tab.description: Adds the name of the faction in the browser tab.

faction_hide_description.description: Adds a toggle to hide the faction description of other factions.

faction_hide_announcement.description: Adds a toggle to hide your own faction's announcement box.

discord_copy.description: Adds a button to every forum post that copies the post to a Discord format.

blocked_users.description: Adds the option to block users on the forums. Adds block button on posts and block list on main forum page.

autofill_api.description: Autofull API input with your API key, clickable and control+clickable fields, and other QoL improvements.

torn_stats_graph.description: Adds a graph of your battle stats information from Torn Stats. Requires Torn Stats.

faction_gym_gains.description: Adds text to easily know what Steadfast gym gains your factions has set for each stat.

disable_stats.description: Sets the gym stat icons to buttons that can disabled specific gym stats.

effective_stats.description: Adds a section to the home page that shows your effective battle stats.

live_networth.description: Adds a bar below your daily networth that shows your live networth.

max_buy_abroad.description: Adds a button to the shops while abroad to max all item quantity fields.

quick_items.description: Adds a window that allows you to quickly use items.

item_values.description: Adds a value indicator next to each item.

npc_info.description: Adds information about loot times to NPC attack pages.

profile_stats.description: Adds a window that shows information about the player from Torn Stats. Requires Torn Stats.

age_to_text.description: Converts Torn age to text format on user profiles.

city_finds.description: Adds a window that shows a list of items on the city map and highlights them for easier viewing.

bounty_filter.description: Adds a bar that allows you to filter bountied players.

quick_jail.description: Adds a window that allows you to filter jailed players and quickly bust or bail them out.

quick_crimes.description: Adds a window that allows you to quickly commit crimes.

christmas_town_helper.description: Adds a window with a large assortment of features for Christmas Town including: showing invisible walls, game cheats, items/chest locations, etc.

auction_filter.description: Adds a window that allows you to filter weapons, armor, and items on the auction house market.

duplicate_pagination.description: Duplicates the pagination and modifies page arrows for easier auction house searching.

case_management.description: Adds extra buttons to the Display Case management page for easier sorting.

cache_value.description: Adds the total value of the caches earned for each faction in the ranked war report.

npc_list.description: Adds a list of NPCs and loot times to the sidebar.

quick_links.description: Adds custom links to the sidebar.

refill_reminder.description: Adds a subtle highlight to Energy and Nerve bars when refills are available.

bar_links.description: Makes the Energy and Nerve bars clickable links to their respective pages.

max_buy_torn.description: Adds a small button on purchasable items to quickly max the amount field.

torn_stats_events.description: Shows a popup when you recieve an event on Torn Stats. Requires Torn Stats.

left_align.description: Aligns Torn to the left to fit more chats.

last_action_mini_profile.description: Adds a user's last action to the mini profile.

hide_level_up.description: Hide the level up link on the sidebar and on the homepage.

highlights.description: Highlights names or messages in chats.

trade_search.description: Adds a search input on trade chat.

tab_autocomplete.description: Adds the ability to autocomplete names in chat using the tab key.
